Class AbstractConnection

Show UML class diagram
  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlcb.AbstractConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connection
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatagramMeteringBuffer.ReplyHandler, MessageDecoder, MonPane.InputLink, ProducerPane.InputLink, ScatterGather.SingleConnection

    public abstract class AbstractConnection
extends Object
implements Connection
    Partial implementation of Connection with null startup behavior

        public abstract void put(Message msg,
                         Connection sender)
        Put a message to this connection.
        Specified by:
        put in interface Connection
        Parameters:
        sender - Node that is sending the message, used for tracking, logging, etc. (This models a two-ended connection to whatever communications link is used)
